Pre-Wedding
Beach Day

Thursday, March 12, 2026
11:00 – 19:00
Beach Day at El Sunzal,
La Libertad
(35 minutes drive from San Salvador)
Bring your beach clothes!

To start the celebrations, we invite our friends and family from abroad to enjoy a relaxed and fun day with us at the beach.
Shuttle Service
San Salvador ↔ El Sunzal
Transportation will be provided to international guests from XXX Hotel to El Sunzal.
Pick-up time at XXX Hotel: 11:00 am
Return time to San Salvador: 19:00 pm
Keep in Mind
Bring swimsuit, towel, sunglasses, sunscreen, flip flops, and light clothing.
Food and drinks will be provided.
Please RSVP via Camille (+33670831699).
Pre-Wedding
Ataco Day

Friday, March 13, 2026
10:00 – 17:30
Day in Ataco's country house and town
(1.5-2 hours drive from San Salvador)
We warmly invite friends and family traveling from abroad to join us for lunch at Liana’s country house, followed by a visit to Ataco, a charming town in the mountains of El Salvador.
Shuttle Service
San Salvador ↔ Ataco
Transportation will be provided to international guests from XXX Hotel to Ataco.
Pick-up time at XXX Hotel: 10:00 am
Return time to San Salvador: 17:30 pm
Keep in Mind
Pack a pair of comfortable shoes so you can easily explore the town.
Food and drinks will be provided.
Please RSVP via Camille (+33670831699).
